org.svvrl.goal.core.draw

Class DrawerRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.draw.DrawerRepository

  • public class DrawerRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    A DrawerRepository contains a pool of registered drawers.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Method Detail

      • addDrawer

        public static void addDrawer(java.lang.Class<? extends Editable> cls,
                             java.lang.Class<? extends EditableDrawer<? extends Editable>> drawer)
        Inserts a drawer capable of drawing a type of editable objects.
        Parameters:
        cls - the class of editable objects supported by drawer
        drawer - the drawer capable of drawing objects with class cls

      • getDrawer

        public static EditableDrawer<? extends Editable> getDrawer(Editable obj)
                                                    throws UnsupportedException
        Returns a drawer capable of drawing a specified editable object.
        Parameters:
        obj - an editable object to be drawn
        Returns:
        a drawer capable of drawing obj
        Throws:
        UnsupportedException - if there is no drawer capable of drawing obj

      • addIdleDrawer

        public static void addIdleDrawer(java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                                 java.lang.Class<? extends IdleDrawer<?>> drawer)
        Inserts an idle drawer capable of drawing the information for some kind of objects.
        Parameters:
        cls - the class of objects supported by the idle drawer
        drawer - the class of the idle drawer

      • getIdleDrawer

        public static IdleDrawer<?> getIdleDrawer(java.lang.Object obj,
                                          int x,
                                          int y,
                                          java.awt.Rectangle r)
                                   throws UnsupportedException
        Returns an idle drawer capable of drawing the information of a specified object at a specified location with a specified visible area.
        Parameters:
        obj - an object with information to be drawn
        x - the x coordinate of the upper left location for the display area
        y - the y coordinate of the upper left location for the display area
        r - the while visible area
        Returns:
        a drawer capable of drawing the information of the object
        Throws:
        UnsupportedException - if there is no idle drawer capable of drawing the information of the object
